summary: STAGES is a film about Roos and Martin, who are divorced but haven't become detached yet. When their 17-year old son Isaac withdraws ever deeper into silent isolation, they try to find a ... See full summary »
cast: Elsie de Brauw|Marcel Musters|Stijn Koomen|Jeroen Willems|Joan Nederlof|Jennifer Jago|Shireen Strooker
title: Tussenstand
